name: Tiny Tanks (itch) (Wisp)
description:
Whoa hey, hi there! My buddy and I just whipped this up for a jam so it's still super early and rough, but if you like it, leave a comment and/or check back later when we've improved it!

This game is about tiny tanks (made of the stuff that goes missing from your desk, like rubber bands, paper clips, and thumb tacks!) invading your furniture and obviously now it's up to you to repel them with your own tabletop tank!!

Print out this logo, then point your phone's camera at it in-game to see your tiny tank come to life! Use the on-screen joystick and button to move and shoot down bad guy tanks, which currently aren't very threatening because there isn't any AI in the game yet...but never mind that! More updates to follow, so if you had any thoughts about the game please leave a comment with some of that sweet, sweet feedback. And hey, thanks for checking out our game!
